title: Circle of the Land
content: turnsRange: 18mRadius: 1mCON SaveConcentration Pass without Trace Lv 2 Abjuration ActionLevel 2 Spell Slot Call forth a veil of shadows and silence that gives you and all nearby companions a +10 bonus to Stealth checks.Until Long RestConcentration Protection from Poison Lv 2 Abjuration ActionLevel 2 Spell Slot Touch a creature to grant it protection against poisonious influences.You neutralise all poisons affecting it, grant it Advantage on Saving Throws against being Poisoned, and grant it Res
